message: Rubio cares about the country deeply. He has served the public for 16 years. It's his passion and he works very hard. You are entitled to your opinion, of course. But mine is that Rubio has the best chance of beating Hillary. His story is the essence of the American Dream and I find him to be uplifting and unifying with great ideas! #rubio2016

Also, I asked for BF support the second day, but was told the woman was not available that day. Took a few tries but my baby & I finally figured it out on our own. A lot of stress could have been avoided with just a little support.
